Edit #4: Nothing will stop me from creating the longest series of edit-replies humanly possible.

Pretty sure he is not advertising a new skin idea.

Edit: Pretty sure your edit is a cover up.

Edit #2: Oh no you didn't (black lady voice) Don't be trying to fool nobody. Ain't nobody got time for that.
For the record, there are these things called replies. You seem to have their purpose confused with edits.

I told you. What did I tell you? Didn't I tell you? Cause I told you! Mm-hmm! And when did I tell you? A long time ago. And what did I say would happen when I told you? Exactly what just happened.
Paramedic Soraka, the dream...

I main Soraka, and will often run TP (because I'm rarely in range of an enemy to use Exhaust). Sometimes, if I'm about to back and I don't need to return to lane quickly, I'll use my TP to go top lane and patch up the top laner.

Often results in a very frustrated enemy top laner, especially if ours is a low-sustain champion that they'd manage to whittle down over the minutes.

Oh that sounds good. I will have to try that.

Here is another interesting thing about Soraka for you;

So in my language **Raka ** means **Hand**, while **So** means **Width**; "**So Raka**" is a commonly used expression to witch literal translation is **With hand** but the meaning is more like "**Using a hand**", or even more accurate "**Hand-Job**".
oh god what language is that
only thought: Yukki
thank you for posting that. That needs to be posted more often

Turn on the lights and close your eyes...

Because evil doesn't seem to find you wen you're in disguise...

I usually run Heal on Soraka, it guarantees you get the health back from it to use with W, whoever you use it on will not have it reduced by greivous wounds since it's healing from another source and it frees up the ADC to take whatever summoner they want, {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:1}} {{summoner:14}}

> [{quoted}](name=Krinu,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=eYAquyR7,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-12-15T20:47:54.368+0000)
>
> I main Soraka, and will often run TP (because I'm rarely in range of an enemy to use Exhaust). Sometimes, if I'm about to back and I don't need to return to lane quickly, I'll use my TP to go top lane and patch up the top laner.
> 
> Often results in a very frustrated enemy top laner, especially if ours is a low-sustain champion that they'd manage to whittle down over the minutes.

Not a Soraka main, but tried this in a few normals today. Worked surprisingly well!

Not only did I get to frequently top off other lanes, but if my _own_ lane was losing, I'd heal up my ADC, recall, then immediately teleport back in. That turned things around pretty well. Moreover, mid-late game, I found myself frequently teleporting to team mates that'd been caught out to spam heals and turn battles around. Helped a lot when my team tried to split push.

10/10 would recommend.
I too play much Soraka. This sounds like the best thing ever. I am going to try it!
